author: mamta
msg: DERBY-5079 " DERBY-4984 caused a regression which will not allow users to drop a table if the table was involved in a trigger action rebind during ALTER TABLE DROP COLUMN

author: stsp
msg: Move all depth-related things in revision status out of the node walker.
(analyze_status): Don't look for excluded or absent nodes, and ignore depth.
svn_wc__db_has_absent_children(), which are removed by this commit.
Do not walk hidden nodes anymore, because they were only interesting
(STMT_SELECT_SPARSE_NODES): New. Figures out the equivalent of what
analyze_status() wanted to know about sparse checkouts.
svn_wc__db_has_absent_children): Merge these two functions into ...
(svn_wc__db_revision_status): ... this one, which does the same and
also handles sparse nodes completely. The plan is to extend this
function in later commits, so that revision status will eventually

author: sascharodekamp
msg: Improvement - Added a new method: getRelatedByAndCache because there is only a methode getRelatedByAnd which uses no cache.
